title: Bug 19651: Team menu disappears from Hierarchy and Packages view
description: The Team menu is missing from the Hierarchy and Packages view. This issue was noticed in step 9. Please note that TestClass.java is not in any CVS repository, but the problem was initially observed with a file managed by CVS.
OB: Verify that the Team menu is present in the Hierarchy and Packages view.
EB:
Upon performing the following steps:
11) Select the word InnerClass in the text editor and press F4
12) In the new hierarchy view, the Team menu is not available. This behavior is expected since InnerClass is an inner class.
13) Select the word TestClass in the new text editor and press F4. The Team menu is not available, although it should be since TestClass is not an inner class.
14) You should have 3 opened windows.
SR: Ensure that the Team menu is consistently displayed in the Hierarchy and Packages view for all classes, regardless of whether they are inner classes or not.
